casebody.data:
Lebert BIHM, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. LYKES BROS. STEAMSHIP CO. Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 174, Docket 28044. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Nov. 12, 1963. Decided Nov. 12, 1963. Thomas J. Doyle, New York City, N. Y. (Cooper, Ostrin, DeVarco & Acker-man, New York City, on the brief), for plaintiff-appellant. Arthur M. Boal, New York City (Boal, McQuade & Fitzpatrick, New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before LUMBARD, Chief Judge, and KAUFMAN and HAYS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

We affirm the judgment in open court.

See also D.C., 213 F.Supp. 899.
